function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of education and communication about healthy choices","Impact":"Increased health risks and inability to promote change","Mitigation":"Implement educational programs and improve interpersonal communication","Technologies":"Health education technology and communication tools","People":"Individuals and communities","Owner":"Health organizations and educational institutions"},{"Description":"Economic instability leading to higher medical and health risks","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to health risks due to income level and unemployment","Mitigation":"Implement economic stability measures and support for employment","Technologies":"Economic support programs and job creation initiatives","People":"Low-income individuals and unemployed persons","Owner":"Government and social support agencies"},{"Description":"Environmental degradation impacting health","Impact":"Negative health effects due to climate change and environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Implement measures to address climate change and protect the environment","Technologies":"Renewable energy, conservation technologies, and climate mitigation strategies","People":"General population and vulnerable communities","Owner":"Environmental protection agencies and government entities"}]}
